data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Limassol, Cyprus to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Limassol, Cyprus
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Limassol, Cyprus to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary: On average, 14 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Limassol, Cyprus.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, help your children in Limassol, Cyprus find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Limassol who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Persian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Limassol, Cyprus, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 175,387 cultural Christians in the state of Limassol to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Limassol, Cyprus to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
